name: Jump！
description: This is a simple-stroke style platform game. Your goal is to reach the end by jumping on the platform. The game has five difficulty levels, the first three are easy, and the last two are difficult. They are: Jump! (Understand the gameplay), bird! (Add bird (enemy)), drop! (The platform will fall), fast! (Difficult (fast moving platform)), hell! (Very fast moving platform and multiple enemies). This game can be played on the web or downloaded. Hope you can play well!
